_usage.Title: Usage:

in_image.Title: Input image:
in_image.Help: Full path to input image file.

out_image.Title: Output image:
out_image.Help: Full path to output image file.

save_copy.Title: Save as a copy
save_copy.Help: Enable this to save a file <name>-copy.ext in place.

text.Title: Text:
text.Help: Text to draw on input image file.

text_pos_x.Title: Pos X:
text_pos_x.Help: Horizontal coordinate of text to draw, in ratio relative to image size.

text_pos_y.Title: Pos Y:
text_pos_y.Help: Vertical coordinate of text to draw, in ratio relative to image size.

color_r.Title: Color.R:
color_r.Help: Red component of RGB color value for text.

color_g.Title: Color.G:
color_g.Help: Green component of RGB color value for text.

color_b.Title: Color.B:
color_b.Help: Blue component of RGB color value for text.

font.Title: Font:
font.Help: Font name of text to draw; actual font file to use depends on platforms.

font_size.Title: Size:
font_size.Help: Font size of text to draw; actual size depends on fonts.
